sentence: Staff is very professional and courteous restaurants are exactly as they are described and most importantly it is a quiet place to go
We also enjoyed dinner at Café Elan
Good breakfast buffet in the morning
This includes the personnel at the par 3 Paddys the Bordeaux room the dining staff the hotel staff and definitely the wine tasting hostess
The property was well maintained the buffet was awesome it was a wonderful experience
The resort and subset were excellent along with the food at the restaurants
We ate at the Cafe Elan and our chauffeur there was Frank another VERY friendly young man
We also had lunch at the spa and the service and food were both excellent
We booked a couples massage and it was nice along with playing golf though it rained we had fun until hole 14 and enjoyed breakfast and a rain break at the golf clubhouse
We ate all of our meals at the Versailles
Buffet was overpriced for the small selection of food options
There is also a spa winery Irish Pub par 3 golf course and an 18 hole golf course
The buffet area was hot and uncomfortable as well

I am a chef myself it is such a small buffet for the price they charge and who pays for tea on a bufeti got sick 2 times throwing up and had to stop eating and still paid 400 dollars for my meal well my husband do not have to worry about me nagging him to take me anymore I rather go juicy crab and I was thinking about doing my birthday here I pass
Save your money and opt for in room dining rather than the breakfast buffet
I went to the bar manager and explained it was our anniversary and we had no been served yet and that I could observe empty glasses everywhere
After HOURS of shooting around the property we went downstairs to have dinner at Versailles
And there were only four or five groups in the entire restaurant
The places I would recommend here is the Marc restaurant and of course the spa
Also the 40 cheese plate is a lopsided aluminum pan
